thread.title: Seychelles delegation led by tourism minister heads to IFTM Top Resa Tourism Trade Fair in Paris
thread.title_full: Seychelles delegation led by tourism minister heads to IFTM Top Resa Tourism Trade Fair in Paris

author: eTN Editor
title: Seychelles delegation led by tourism minister heads to IFTM Top Resa Tourism Trade Fair in Paris
text:
Seychelles delegation led by tourism minister heads to IFTM Top Resa Tourism Trade Fair in Paris   
Sep 27, 2015 Alain St.Ange, Seychelles Minister for Tourism and Culture eTN   
A Seychelles tourism delegation headed by Alain St.Ange, the island's Minister responsible for Tourism and Culture, is on its way to the IFTM Top Resa Tourism Trade Fair taking place in Paris at Porte de Versailles from September 29 to October 2, 2015. 
This year because of ongoing construction works going on at the fair, the Seychelles stand at the fair has this year moved to Stand U38 in Pavillion 1. 
"Seychelles is again this year well-represented by a public-private sector delegation to the IFTM Top Resa Tourism Trade Fair taking place in Paris. A busy three days await the delegation with many pre-organized meetings scheduled with French tour operators interested to reposition Seychelles now that we have once again a direct nonstop flight between Paris and Seychelles," Minister St.Ange said as he prepared to head off to Paris. 
The Seychelles Minister will also be joining his Indian Ocean Vanilla Islands counterparts for meetings and also for a joint press conference after a signature and meetings with cruise ships interested in increasing their runs in the Indian Ocean region. 
The Seychelles delegation is made up as follows: 
SEYCHELLES TOURISM BOARD Mr. Alain ST.ANGE, Minister for Tourism & Culture Mrs. Bernadette WILLEMIN, France & Europe Director Ms. Christine VEL, Marketing Executive Ms. Jennifer DUPUY, Marketing Executive Ms. Mavreen POUPONNEAU, Marketing Executive 
AIR SEYCHELLES Ms. Cindy VIDOT, Head of Sales – Commercial Business Mrs. Christine OZOUF, Development Manager 
BERJAYA RESORTS SEYCHELLES Ms. Wendy TAN Mr. Len JACKSON, Director of Sales Operations Management 
BEACHCOMBER SAINTE ANNE ISLAND Mr. Norbert COUVREUR, General Manager 
CORAL STRAND SMART CHOICE Mr. Denis VERKHORUBOV, General Manager 
CREOLE TRAVEL SERVICES Mr. Guillaume ALBERT, General Manager Ms. Anna Mary JORRE DE ST JORRE, Marketing Manager 
EDEN BLEU HOTEL Ms. Amanda LANG, Sales Manager 
KEMPINSKI SEYCHELLES RESORT Mr. Masami EGAMI, General Mangaer Ms. Natalie LITOWTSCHIK, Director of Sales 
MASONS TRAVEL Mr. Lenny ALVIS, General Manager Mr. Paul LEBON, Sales Manager 
PARADISE SUN Mr. Lionel FERRARI, General Manager Ms. Elke MENZ, Sales Representative – Europe 
PURE SEYCHELLES HOTELS Mr. Eddie D’OFFAY, Director 
SAVOY RESORT & SPA Ms. Katerina FERGUSSON, Director of Sales Mr. Benoit PILLET, Marketing Representative France & Benelux 
THE H RESORT BEAU VALLON BEACH SEYCHELLES Ms. Isabelle LE STRAT, Director of Sales & Marketing 
Seychelles is a founding member of the International Coalition of Tourism Partners (ICTP) . For more information on Seychelles Minister of Tourism and Culture Alain St.Ange, click here . Source: Seychelles Ministry of Tourism and Culture
